channel.title: Need an experienced coder
channel.description: Looking for an experienced coder to help me code my server! My msn is Xtgscott@hotmail.com. Help would be highly appreciated since i'm taking on a big task. More coders would be appreiciated so I can get my server up and running. This server will be based on Runescape. My goals for this server is as less lag as possible, if none. Specs, all weapons, custom item ID's for the client that I will be making as well, Skillcapes, Mini-games, etc...etc... Help would be HIGHLY APPRECIATED and any coder that will help me will be givin' co-owner or admin depending on how much they do help! Thanks guys!

item.title: Need an experienced coder
item.dc:creator: @Aamir Aamir
item.description:
@Aamir wrote:

lol lamo why would some 1 waste tehre time to help u they can code there own server…

Read full topic

item.title: Need an experienced coder
item.dc:creator: @xtgscott xtgscott
item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

[Just a question. But why would someone help you with your server, if you just started, and they could make one their selves.
If your going for no lag, your going to want a dedicate or a good computer and internet connection.

Maybe start off on your own so people think its worth their time and your not just downloading a Pimpscape server and trying to ‘edit’ it to ‘your’ server by changing a few things, names, and npcs.]
-tyrael-

Yeah well, I didn’t ask for smart ass replies did I? I’m not new. I said I do know how to code. For all you know I could be a genius at this stuff and just now joining Moparscape Forums. But I’m not. I said I knew a thing or two about coding, I’ve taught myself and all I asked for was help, not your bull shit replies dumb fuck.

Read full topic

item.title: Need an experienced coder

item.description:

24 rep junior member.

Well im quite a good coder been doing it a couple of year's but i have one question. Why the hell do i need you ?

I doubt it.

item.title: Need an experienced coder
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

Just a question. But why would someone help you with your server, if you just started, and they could make one their selves.
If your going for no lag, your going to want a dedicate or a good computer and internet connection.

Maybe start off on your own so people think its worth their time and your not just downloading a Pimpscape server and trying to ‘edit’ it to ‘your’ server by changing a few things, names, and npcs.
-tyrael-
